title: Microsoft | SDE 2
content:
Education: Tier 2 college
Years of Experience: 3.9
Current Experience: Service based (consultancy), Gurgaon
Current Compensation: 12.5 (fixed) + 1.5 variable
Company: Microsoft 
Title/Level: SDE 2 (L61)
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 25 L (fixed including PF)
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 3.9 L
Stock bonus: 40K USD
Bonus: Performance based 
Benefits: standard MS benefits

Competing offer : 28L base + 2.8L bonus + 3.8 joining/ relocation bonus (mid size product company)

Please suggest if this compensation is a lowball and how much should be expected given that I have a competing offer as well. Thanks in advance.

title: Google L5 Offer Bengalore
content:
Google Offer
* Education: Tier 1 College (CSE)
* Years of Experience: 5
* Prior Experience: Combination of Big Tech and Start up
* Date of the Offer: 01/05/2024
* Company: Google
* Title/Level: L5
* Location: Bengalore
* Salary: 61 Lakhs
* Relocation/Signing Bonus: 8 Lakhs
* Stock bonus: 230K (Google Vesting schedule)
* Bonus: 15% Target
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 1.42 Cr excluding Joining Bonus
* Benefits: [Relocation: 5 Lakh, other Google Perks]

Year 1: ~ 1.5cr
Year 2 onwards (assuming stock compensation remains same due to refreshers): 1.42 Cr 
Current CTC: 1Cr
I am trying to evaluate whether I need to switch or try growing ay current company. I did not interview at any other place so I do not have any competing offer. This is the only offer I got from Google without any Negotiation. 
Its a research role so I am very excited about it but I am also at a comfort zone in my current company. Pretty scared of imposter syndrome to happen at Google during first few months.

Preparation: 
- I used to be very strong at competitive coding during my college days so I just prepared for 15 days for coding and did really well in all rounds.
- System design: My work requires a lot of Distributed Systems, so I just had to read "Designing Data Intensive Application" Book and "Alex Xu" for preparation, thats it.
- Strong recomendations from L7 and L8 at Google who I had worked with at my previous company.

title: Microsoft | L61 | Bangalore
content:
- Education: B.tech in Computer Science, Tier III college
- Years of Experience: ~5
- Prior Experience: SDE I at AMZN, SDE II at a start-up
- Date of the Offer: March 2024
- Company: Microsoft     
- Title/Level: Software Engineer II - L61
- Location: Bangalore
- Salary: 31,00,000 INR
- Relocation: not eligible
- Signing Bonus: 3,00,000 FY + 2,00,000 SY     
- Stock bonus: $90K stock grant vested over 4 years     
- Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 20% of salary every year     
- Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 31L Base + 3L JB + 3L PB + ~18L RSU = ~55L
- Benefits: standard MSFT India benefits  
- Other details: Negotiated twice, original offer did not have second year bonus and stocks were only 75K initially. No competing offer.
- Past Salary - 33L Base + 3L PB (No other component, all cash)


Interview exp - https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/5119932/Microsoft-Interview-Experience-L61-BLR
